item.title: IntelliJ - serialVersionUID - enabling
item.description: If you are wondering why when you make a POJO bean to implement Serializable, IntelliJ does not throw any warnings to create the serialVersionUID variable… It’s because you need to enable it. Here’s how: Cheers!
